Consumer Products

Hi Shonagh,

Thanks for a quick call,

We have updated the Updated the same product from Bug Bite Thing Suction Tool to Bug Bite Thing Suction Tool (Buy one get one Free).

We have disabled the bogof coupon.

Cart shipping
  • When Bug Bite Thing Suction Tool (Buy one get one Free) is added to cart with 1 quantity. Flat rate: 3 items and less: $9.99
  • When Bug Bite Thing Suction Tool (Buy one get one Free) is added to cart with 2 or more quantity. Flat rate: 4 items and over: $15.00

Hi @joel - context here. Let me know if thats clear - the issue seems to be on invoicing.
https://www.loom.com/share/11a599e0bedc427da43daedea5eb3160

Hi Shonagh,

Awesome, just need a little bit of confirmation. That would be great.
Here is the number: 1300 072 134

Hi Joel

Sorry I think I have confused you.

Buy one get one free can be applied if they purchase one unit. They can get a second free, but they must apply the promo code otherwise they only get one unit dispatched. Does that make sense?

Should I call you to clarify?

Shonagh Kelly
National Sales Manager
Consumer Products
The Kelly Company

Hi Shonagh,

Thanks for confirming.

Here is the tagline Buy 2 or More, Get 50% Off – Instant Mosquito Bite Relief! Use coupon: BOGOF
https://thebugbitething.com.au/
https://thebugbitething.com.au/product/bug-bite-thing-suction-tool/

Bugbitething x 1 = 13.99 (wont be able to use bogof) - Shipping is 9.99
Bugbitething x 2 = 27.98 (with coupon = 13.99) (can use bogof) - Shipping is 9.99
Bugbitething x 3 = 41.97 (with coupon = 20.98 (can use bogof) - Shipping is 9.99
Bugbitething x 4 = 55.96 (with coupon = 27.98 (can use bogof) - Shipping is 15.00

Hi Joel

Yes on our side it is fine as long as freight totals are accurate. If someone purchases two units and gets two free, (4 units in total) then freight needs to be $15 not $9.99

Ideally we just need the customer receipt to specifically show the customer how many units are being sent at the discounted rate? So if they order 1 and get 1 free then they are receiving 2 items.

Shonagh

Shonagh Kelly 2 Bonz Place Seven Hills NSW Australia

The Kelly Group PO Box 516 Blacktown NSW 2148

Sales Manager P: 02 8811 3710 M:0413 707 945

Consumer Division E: shonagh@kellycompany.com.au

@smartlivinghomegarden_au

Hi Shonagh,

We are currently looking into this,

We have setup a bogof with 50% off. But they can only use this if the qty is more or equal to 2.

Ex:
Bugbitething x 1 = 13.99 (wont be able to use bogof)
Bugbitething x 2 = 27.98 (with coupon = 13.99) (can use bogof)
Bugbitething x 3 = 41.97 (with coupon = 20.98 (can use bogof)
Bugbitething x 4 = 55.96 (with coupon = 27.98 (can use bogof)

Does this work for you?

Hi Joel

This lets me know that a customer has chosen the BOGOF promo however I need the customers confirmation to show that 2 items will be dispatched rather than just one at half price. Refer email below.



Shonagh
